info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 8:01PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Schenectady, south central Warren, eastern Fulton, Saratoga and east central Montgomery Counties through 845 PM EDT... At 800 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Edinburg to near Hagaman to near Duanesburg. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Schenectady, Clifton Park, Rotterdam, Saratoga Springs, Amsterdam, Scotia, Mechanicville, Glenville, Niskayuna, Duanesburg, Ballston Spa, Corinth, Waterford, Broadalbin, Hagaman, Edinburg, Northville, Round Lake, Galway and Day Center. People attending Saratoga Race Course (Horses), and Saratoga Performing Arts Center (SPAC) should seek safe shelter immediately! This includes the following highways... Interstate 88 between exits 24 and 25. Interstate 90 between exits 25a and 26. Interstate 890 between exits 1a and 9. Interstate 87 between exits 8A and 17N. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
